docs.lead_paragraph: THE Eighteenth Amendment has cut the number of arrests for drunkenness more than in half.

headline.main: DRY LAW CREDITED WITH WIDE BENEFIT; Haynes Says It Has Reduced Crime and Stimulated Our Prosperity. CHURCHES GAIN MEMBERS Increase in Bank Deposits Also Traced to Economy Induced by Prohibition Act. WORKERS' WELFARE CITED Commissioner Believes Nation's Whole Social Structure Has Reacted Favorably to Enforcement. PROHIBITION INSIDE OUT Twenty-seventh Instalment

docs.abstract: Comr Haynes tells of reduction in cases as result of prohibition
docs.snippet: THE Eighteenth Amendment has cut the number of arrests for drunkenness more than in half.

byline.original: By ROY A. HAYNES, U.S. Prohibition Commissioner
